com.pcr3w.jscraft.minecraft.entity.player.inventory

Class PlayerInventory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.pcr3w.jscraft.minecraft.mod.JsRegisteredClass
      • com.pcr3w.jscraft.minecraft.mod.MinecraftClassWrapper
        • com.pcr3w.jscraft.minecraft.entity.player.inventory.PlayerInventory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IWrapper

    public class PlayerInventory
extends MinecraftClassWrapper
    This class wraps around a Minecraft player inventory, allowing the methods and fields to be accessed
    Author:
    pcr3w

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PlayerInventory(net.minecraft.entity.player.InventoryPlayer inv)
      Creates a new instance wrapping around the given Minecraft player inventory

        public int getCurrentItemIndex()
        Returns:
        The index of the item held by the player (0 - 8)

      • getArmourInventory

        public ItemStack[] getArmourInventory()
        Returns:
        An array of all of the armour items in the armour slots

      • getMainInventory

        public ItemStack[] getMainInventory()
        Returns:
        An array of all of the items in the inventory (excluding the armour slots)
